generated_description: gourmet experts, legally known as gourmet experts ltd., is a company based in neumünster, schleswig-holstein, specializing in the import and distribution of high-quality gourmet meat products. founded in 2015 by marc funder, the company focuses on providing premium meats, including irish angus beef, irish lamb, duck, and smoked salmon, as well as other gourmet products such as dry-aged steaks, relishes, and specialty sauces. gourmet experts emphasizes sustainability and ethical practices, ensuring that their products are free from antibiotics, steroids, and hormones, and are sourced from small, sustainable farms. the company serves both individual customers and restaurants across europe.
